bestiary.name: Baleful Bouncer
bestiary.description: A living baby bouncer that restrains creatures and shakes them, especially effective if they have a messy diaper.

bestiary.name: Dastardly Diaper
bestiary.description: An animated diaper that grapples creatures and forces them to have accidents.

bestiary.name: Pacifying Pacifier
bestiary.description: A flying pacifier that inserts itself into a creature's mouth, reducing their intelligence and preventing spellcasting.

bestiary.name: Predatory Plush
bestiary.description: A living plush toy that can petrify creatures into plush themselves and has hypnotic, swirly eyes.

bestiary.name: Putrid Pail
bestiary.description: A flying diaper pail with a powerful stench that can poison creatures and launch soiled diapers at them.

bestiary.name: Wrathful Rattle
bestiary.description: An animated baby rattle that can charm creatures with its sound.

bestiary.name: Aromatic Tangler
bestiary.description: A plant-like creature that grapples and restrains victims with its vines, emitting a charming aroma.

bestiary.name: Aromatic Trapvine
bestiary.description: An insidious plant that entraps victims, regresses them, and feeds off their waste inside a special diaper-fruit.

bestiary.name: Bogeyman
bestiary.description: A spectral undead that haunts children, causing them to wet the bed in fear. It is banished by bright light.

bestiary.name: Cherub
bestiary.description: A small, baby-like angel that serves the gods of the Plane of Padding. It can heal but also physically regress creatures with its touch.

bestiary.name: Daycare Dragon
bestiary.description: A powerful dragon transformed by the Plane of Padding. It has a regression breath weapon and a hypnotic voice, and loves to make 'friends'.

bestiary.name: Decadent
bestiary.description: Beastkin transformed by the Plague of Decadence into sugary, cannibalistic creatures driven by lust and sadomasochism.

bestiary.name: Diapercritter
bestiary.description: A large elemental that looks like a dragon made of diapers. It can swallow creatures and transform them into juvenile diapercritters.

bestiary.name: Draconic Care Automata
bestiary.description: Large, plush-like constructs created by ancient dragons to be non-violent caretakers in their nurseries. They often mistake adventurers for babies.

bestiary.name: Hound of Tinklelos
bestiary.description: An ethereal, dog-like aberration that feeds on a creature's continence, draining their bladder control with its tongue.

bestiary.name: Jelly Baby
bestiary.description: A baby-blue or pink ooze that mentally regresses and charms its victims by engulfing them. It loves candy.

bestiary.name: Potty Monster
bestiary.description: A worm-like creature that lives in potties and sewers, feasting on waste and ambushing unsuspecting victims.
